page.title: 05BIOGRAPHY
page.content: {Miss D.Underwood}is the Secretary of the {W.I.}She finds it interesting, but it takes more time than she expected. The work mainly involves recording the minutes of the meetings, and writing letters. {Miss Underwood} has only been Secretary for one year. She took over from{Miss Knowles}who worked at Madresfield Court until she died.The {W.I.}meets on Mondays at Madresfield Court. There are 20 members, and about 14 attend each meeting. There has been a {W.I.} in Madresfield since 1968. The President of the {W.I.}is Miss Bowles. By Joanne Pearce,Vicky Lockley.
